notes: Issue #607 requests SKTouchAction.Entered and SKTouchAction.Exited event support on iOS and Android. Source code inspection confirms the implementation gap: the Windows SKTouchHandler wires PointerEntered/PointerExited to SKTouchAction.Entered/Exited, and Tizen partially maps PointStateType.Leave to Exited, but the Apple (iOS/macOS) and Android SKTouchHandler classes only fire Pressed, Moved, Released, and Cancelled — they never emit Entered or Exited. Runtime verification of touch event behavior requires actual iOS and Android devices or emulators, which are not available in this environment.

versionResults.notes: Source code inspection confirms the gap: Apple SKTouchHandler (TouchesBegan/Moved/Ended/Cancelled) and Android SKTouchHandler (Down/Move/Up/Cancel) never emit Entered or Exited. Runtime verification requires iOS/Android devices.

reproductionSteps.description: Inspect Apple (iOS/macOS) SKTouchHandler source code for Entered/Exited event support
reproductionSteps.output: No matches found. The Apple touch handler only fires Pressed (TouchesBegan), Moved (TouchesMoved), Released (TouchesEnded), and Cancelled (TouchesCancelled). No Entered or Exited events are emitted.

reproductionSteps.description: Inspect Android SKTouchHandler source code for Entered/Exited event support
reproductionSteps.output: No matches found. The Android touch handler maps MotionEventActions Down/PointerDown to Pressed, Move to Moved, Up/PointerUp to Released, and Cancel to Cancelled. No Entered or Exited events are emitted.

reproductionSteps.description: Verify Windows SKTouchHandler implements Entered/Exited as a reference

blockers: Runtime verification of SKTouchAction.Entered/Exited requires iOS and Android devices or emulators to test touch event firing — these are not available in the current macOS development environment

This is a feature request (type/feature-request) for missing functionality rather than a bug with existing functionality — the Entered/Exited enum values exist but were never wired up on iOS/Android platforms
